extendedInfo.description: This app has been discontinued. Please visit the following url to download the all-new Official Green Bay Packers app:https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.yinzcam.nfl.packers--Introducing the first official app from the 13-time world champion Green Bay Packers. This FREE app is a must-have for any Packers fan! Get up-to-the-minute Packers news, articles, and updates directly from the team. Take this app with you for instant offline access. This app includes: - Up to the minute Packers News - Exclusive Packers Video - Player, Coach and Staff Bios - Depth Charts - Injury Reports - Stats - Packers Schedule - Current StandingsCompatibility:- This app runs best on Android 2.2 or greater on 480px wide phones. Android 2.1 devices will run the app but may experience some issues. Please report any issues at http://nfl.packers.com/app/android/

reviews.comment: Great to be able to keep up with the team.
reviews.author: Pamela Poppe

reviews.title: I\'ll be waiting
reviews.comment: Die Hard GB fan. Been using this app for quite some time. I guess they\'re putting new content into the app. I\'ll be waiting.
reviews.author: Aalim Monk

reviews.title: Go Pack!
reviews.comment: The Best!
reviews.author: joel cortes

reviews.title: Tracker
reviews.comment: This sw does not work sgs2.
reviews.author: Robert Sale-nogwat

reviews.title: Love this app!!
reviews.comment: Go Pack Go!!!
reviews.author: Gwen Wendler

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work
reviews.comment: This app sucks.
reviews.author: Kyle Webster

reviews.comment: Great app
reviews.author: William Thomas

reviews.title: Green Bay
reviews.comment: My favorite team since the mid nineties. All the info I need right here.
reviews.author: Bruce Duryea

reviews.title: Now
reviews.comment: I want the same
reviews.author: Linda Gutierrez

reviews.comment: Bring it back please!!! Go Pack Go!!!!!!
reviews.author: Justin Lentz

reviews.title: Force closes
reviews.comment: Used to love this app. When I upgraded phones, it has never worked. Have a  new Motorola Razar Maxx HD. I expected better results. My old phone which is no linger even made had no problems, and it didn\'t run anything.
reviews.author: Vanessa Arrington

reviews.title: Crashes all the time
reviews.comment: Downloaded the app, noticed issues with scrolling in the comments, but it worked fine. Although the app crashes about 1 1/2 minutes into using it. HTC sensation 4G. Please fix, I love my Pack!
reviews.author: Jesse K

reviews.title: Crash, crash, crash.
reviews.comment: After reading several reviews, it appears you\'ve had this issue for 6 months and you still haven\'t fixed it?  Worked great on my last phone...crashes after 30 seconds of use...  This is like a sad country song, get it together already!!!!
reviews.author: J Cortez

reviews.title: Still force closes after 1 year
reviews.comment: Gets one star because I can\'t give less. When it worked it was a great app. For over a year now, it force closes within 30 secs to a minute of use
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I would give this half a star
reviews.comment: This app crashes literally a minute after I open it. I noted the time I opened it and when it crashed. Literally a minute between each opening and \"unfortunate\" close. Maybe it works okay on other phones but not the HTC One X.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No game highlights
reviews.comment: I\'m a Packers fan in Ohio and I don\'t get to see many games. I downloaded this for the video section but they don\'t upload the game highlights. This app would be perfect for fantasy players but not for me. Uninstalling.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very unstable
reviews.comment: It is unfortunate that an app that is very nicely done force quits constantly. I think my average time in the app before it closes is about 45 seconds, and it always does this. I hope the error reports are being read, because this is a good app, it just doesn\'t stay open.
reviews.author: Andrew Klubertanz

reviews.title: Good app
reviews.comment: But ever since Verizon made me update to Jellybean 2 it constantly shuts down. Please fix!
reviews.author: Jim E Abraham

reviews.title: Worthless
reviews.comment: Can\'t view anything with this app. Always force closes. My viqueens loving hubby likes to rub in that his team app works great no problem.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: App still crashes
reviews.comment: App still freezes. Has this app been integrated for Android 4.0 (ICS) yet? Should have an update by now. Are you affiliated with Green Bay Packers Inc? As a shareholder, would expect a resolution soon. Please fix asap! Update: Draft is tomorrow and still nothing? DMI is a joke. You guys do not deserve to work the Packers. The Green Bay Packers are the ideal organization, not just in sports. You could really learn from them, if you were worthy. Just give up and hand whatever rights to another company!
reviews.author: A Google User
